result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Columbia County Jail - 11/07/2022 at 3:00 PM. (Preliminary Hearing)
Preliminary hearing on November 7, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

NOT ON THE RECORD 

Defendant Amber M Lamb appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney William Scott Nelson in court for Amber M Lamb.  Attorney Matthew Steven McElroy in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty Nelson states the defendant would like to proceed with the preliminary hearing. Defendant requests to be here in person for her preliminary hearing. Court sets prelim for November 7, 2022 at 3:30 PM.
Preliminary Hearing - Schedule or Waiver on October 24, 2022 at 03:45 pm. (emailed to Columbia County Jail)

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt:
2:43 PM Defendant Amber M Lamb appeared by phone, in custody. Attorney Scott Nelson appeared by video. Attorney Matthew Steven McElroy in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty Nelson states he was just appointed on the case. Defendant waives the time limits for the preliminary hearing. Court sets status preliminary for October 24, 2022 at 3:45 PM.

Court adjourned at 2:45 PM.
Preliminary Hearing - Schedule or Waiver scheduled for October 24, 2022 at 03:45 pm.
Instructions for How to Appear Remotely (emailed to Columbia County Jail)

No Contact with Zion Lutheran Church in Kingston or Zion Lutheran Church parking lot. Forms of no contact include: in person, in writing, by telephone, by e-mail, or by any other forms of electronic communication, or through a third party intending to circumvent the no contact provision. Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.  You may be randomly tested for compliance.
Preliminary hearing on October 10, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

No Contact with Zion Lutheran Church in Kingston or Zion Lutheran Church parking lot. Forms of no contact include: in person, in writing, by telephone, by e-mail, or by any other forms of electronic communication, or through a third party intending to circumvent the no contact provision. Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.  You may be randomly tested for compliance.

1:06 PM Defendant Amber M Lamb appeared by video and in custody.  Atty Michael Kapelis via video. Attorney Matthew Steven McElroy in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty Kapelis confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading and requests preliminary hearing. Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count. DA makes bond recommendation. Court sets bond at $500 cash bond and conditions of: No Contact with Zion Lutheran Church in Kingston or Zion Lutheran Church parking lot. Forms of no contact include: in person, in writing, by telephone, by e-mail, or by any other forms of electronic communication, or through a third party intending to circumvent the no contact provision. Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.  You may be randomly tested for compliance.  Court instructs defendant regarding his/her right to a preliminary hearing. Defendant does not waive the time limits. Court will set for preliminary hearing on October 10, 2022 at 2:30 p.m.

Court adjourned at  1:10 p.m.

No Contact with Zion Evangelical Lutheran Church at 326 S. Vine St. Kingston, WI. Forms of no contact include: in person, in writing, by telephone, by e-mail, or by any other forms of electronic communication, or through a third party intending to circumvent the no contact provision.

No Contact with Zion Evangelical Lutheran Church at 326 S. Vine St. Kingston, WI. Forms of no contact include: in person, in writing, by telephone, by e-mail, or by any other forms of electronic communication, or through a third party intending to circumvent the no contact provision.
